name: GitHub Solarized Light
description: A light Solarized style for viewing source code on GitHub.
additional_info:
You may also like style 46850.

Based on the Solarized color scheme by Ethan Schoonver:
http://ethanschoonover.com/solarized

Please feel free to contribute improvements (and check out the Sass source) at GitHub:
http://github.com/jrunning/github-solarized
